description: As a tester i want to ensure that patronages can be purchased
name: Ensure that patronages can be purchased

elements.name: On selected environment i ensure that patronages can be purchased for 1 year no month rounding

steps.name: I am logged into Account area
I click the "Patronages" navigation link
I check the the "patronage" button "color" is "rgb(15, 28, 42)" just "before" selecting for "1 year without rounding"

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 40000ms: Expected to find content: 'Expian Office Taye Test Patronage Year No Month Rounding' within the element: <p.chakra-text.css-0> but never did.
    at Object.selectMembershipButton (cypress/pom/membership.js:10:11)
    at checkCss (cypress/integration/memberships.js:39:9)
    at Context.eval (cypress/integration/memberships.js:45:6)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/resolveStepDefinition.js:193:0)
    at Context.eval (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/createTestFromScenario.js:27:0)

steps.name: I check the the "patronage" button "backgroundColor" is "rgb(125, 227, 203)" just "before" selecting for "1 year without rounding"
I select a "patronage" plan for "1 year without rounding" for purchase
I check the the "patronage" button "color" is "rgb(225, 226, 228)" just "after" selecting for "1 year without rounding"
I check the the "patronage" button "backgroundColor" is "rgb(29, 53, 62)" just "after" selecting for "1 year without rounding"
I click the "Checkout" button
I fill in the customer general information
I click the "View Order" link button
I check that the expiration date is on the same day next year as today
I check that the order reference is same as that on the order complete page

elements.name: On selected environment i ensure that patronages shows expired once validity has passed

steps.name: I should see 'Expired' once validity period has passed
